node.name: NK-Cell-Classifier
node.description: GPU-accelerated single-cell RNA-seq workflow for exploring NK cell differentiation using CITE-seq data from Foltz et al. 2024 (Science Immunology).

node.name: BioGraphRAG
node.description: Implement a system to use GNN and/or LLM to use knowledge graphs to integrate literature with knowledge graphs made from large public datasets (CIVIC, TCGA, CPTAC)

node.name: GWAS-Analysis
node.description: GWAS Analysis of Early onset Pancreatic Cancer

node.name: ATAC_seq
node.description: This repository contains code and analysis for single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) and single-cell ATAC sequencing (scATAC-seq) data, focusing on hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs). The project includes data processing, visualization, and integration of multi-omics data to study gene regulation and cell differentiation.

node.name: stack-perturb-data
node.description: Exploratory analysis using Arc Institute's Stack foundation model
